quote_first:
I asked “What time is sunrise?”
A second’s silence while the crestfallen Bush absorbed his rebuke, and then another voice answered: “
title: The Commodore
author: C.S. Forester

quote_last: . Judging by the appearance of the blood and the beginning of rigor in the side of the face, I guessed that he had been dead about five hours.”
title: Death in Holy Orders
author: P.D. James
